means: （骑马全速追赶猎物时的叫喊声）快跑！

sentence.Network_en: A student says: Tantivy, the teacher should take ax to chop us.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个学生说: 快跑, 老师要拿斧头砍我们.

sentence.Network_en: All the way tantivy, out of breath, run dripping wet.
sentence.Network_cn: 一路快跑, 上气不接下气, 跑得大汗淋漓.

list.abs: by now it and a man simultaneously saw bottle of juice , the turtle to fly the tantivy past to snatch the juice .这时它和一个男乌龟人看见了一瓶果汁，乌龟跑了过去拿了果汁。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: probably imitative of the sound of galloping
